results.name: a(n) = A048675(A285317(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..130
program: A019565(n) = {my(j,v); factorback(Mat(vector(if(n, #n=vecextract(binary(n), "-1..1")), j, [prime(j), n[j]])~))}; \\ This function from _M. F. Hasler_
A048675(n) = my(f = factor(n)); sum(k=1, #f~, f[k, 2]*2^primepi(f[k, 1]))/2; \\ _Michel Marcus_, Oct 10 2016
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 18 2017
